name: Symphony of the Soul
overrideDescription: Double buffs and [armor] on a unit.

additionalTooltips.title: Buff
additionalTooltips.description: Buff effects are generally positive for their target and are represented by green icons.

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.

cardLoreTooltips: It is a shame that the Wurmkin cannot see. These Echoes live in the walls of the Bogwurmâ€™s Remains, creating beautiful displays of light and sound in their harmony almost as if these Echoes speak to one another, creating more knowledge in their communion. I suppose the Wurmkin sense this in their own way.
